gdpr.name: Data Collection Notice
gdpr.description: Website must clearly inform users about data collection
criteria: Clearly states what personal data is collected
Explains the purpose of data collection
Specifies the legal basis for processing

gdpr.name: User Consent
gdpr.description: Website must obtain clear consent for data processing
criteria: Consent is explicit and affirmative
Consent is freely given
Consent can be withdrawn

gdpr.name: Right to Access
gdpr.description: Users must be able to access their personal data
criteria: Explains how users can access their data
Specifies timeframe for providing access
No unreasonable limitations on access

gdpr.name: Right to Erasure
gdpr.description: Users must be able to request deletion of their data
criteria: Explains how users can request deletion
Specifies conditions under which deletion requests may be denied
Explains data retention periods

gdpr.name: Data Portability
gdpr.description: Users must be able to receive and transfer their data
criteria: Explains how users can export their data
Provides information on data format
Specifies any limitations on portability

gdpr.name: Data Breach Notification
gdpr.description: Website must notify users of data breaches
criteria: Explains breach notification process
Specifies timeframe for notification
Indicates what information will be provided

eprivacy.name: Cookie Notice
eprivacy.description: Website must clearly inform users about cookies
criteria: Visible cookie notice on first visit
Explains what cookies are used
Explains the purpose of each cookie

eprivacy.name: Cookie Consent
eprivacy.description: Website must obtain consent for non-essential cookies
criteria: Consent for cookies is obtained before non-essential cookies are placed
Consent is affirmative (not pre-checked boxes)
Users can decline non-essential cookies

eprivacy.name: Cookie Settings
eprivacy.description: Website must allow users to change cookie preferences
criteria: Ability to change cookie settings after initial choice
Clear explanation of how to change cookie settings
Cookie settings are easy to access

eprivacy.name: Cookie Duration
eprivacy.description: Website must inform about cookie duration
criteria: Explains how long cookies remain active
Differentiates between session and persistent cookies
Explains how users can delete cookies

accessibility.name: Web Accessibility
accessibility.description: Website should be accessible to users with disabilities
criteria: Mentions commitment to accessibility
References WCAG standards
Provides contact information for accessibility issues
